hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Jail Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #Zelda's Letter# and #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Shop#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #an Ice Trap#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #4# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #6# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: On second thought, let's not go to Hyrule Castle. 'Tis a silly place.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.
